title: Calculate Bank Transaction Fee
description: A bank charges a fixed fee for each transaction performed by a customer.
problem_statement: Compute the total transaction fee based on the number of transactions and fee per transaction.
hint:
1. Multiply transaction count by fee.
2. Use double for decimal precision.
3. Return the total amount.

title: Check Patient Fever
description: Healthcare systems check if a patient has a fever based on temperature.
problem_statement: Return true if temperature exceeds 37.5 Celsius, otherwise false.
constraints: Only a single value is given
hint:
1. Compare temperature with 37.5.
2. Return true if greater.
3. Return false otherwise.

title: Calculate Cart Total
description: E-commerce platforms compute total prices of items in the shopping cart.
problem_statement: Return the sum of all item prices in the cart.
hint:
1. Loop through the array.
2. Sum all elements.
3. Return the total.

title: Update Game Score
description: Gaming platforms update a player's score after each round.
problem_statement: Return the new total score after adding points gained.
hint:
1. Add points to current score.
2. Return the result.
3. Handle negative points correctly.

title: Check Fee Waiver
description: Banks waive fees for accounts exceeding a minimum balance.
problem_statement: Return true if the balance meets or exceeds 1000, otherwise false.
hint:
1. Compare balance with 1000.
2. Return true if greater or equal.
3. Return false otherwise.
